Articles.Content:
Title says it all...

This time: 7 minutes into flight, waiting for maneuver... maneuver complete... then many keyboard commands just stop working.

I'm on OSX - not sure if that's related. Haven't tried on PC yet.

Any ideas?

thanks

Andrew
If you're launching a probe, check you're not running out of electric charge. That generally applies to manned craft too but it's somewhat less of an issue.

I was gonna say to check your USB cord... my pc sits near the tv, and a long usb cable connects my keyboard... sometimes my dogs sit/lay/trip on the connector and it wiggles loose and my craft suddenly stop responding. :/
